fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the logo image on the statement

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement (e.g., January 1 - March 31)

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Unique number identifying the customer's account with Chase Bank

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the individual or entity holding the account at Chase Bank

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address associated with the account holder at Chase Bank

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: The balance of the account at the start of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_count
fields.description: Number of deposits made to the account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount deposited into the account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_count
fields.description: Number of withdrawals made from the account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount withdrawn from the account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.transactions_count
fields.description: Total number of transactions made on the account during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The balance of the account at the end of the statement period

fields.name: deposit.date
fields.description: Date when a deposit was made to the account

fields.name: deposit.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the deposit transaction

fields.name: deposit.amount
fields.description: Amount of the deposit transaction

fields.name: withdrawal.date
fields.description: Date when a withdrawal was made from the account

fields.name: withdrawal.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the withdrawal transaction

fields.name: withdrawal.amount
fields.description: Amount of the withdrawal transaction

fields.name: balance.date
fields.description: Date when a balance was recorded for the account

fields.name: balance.amount
fields.description: The amount of the recorded balance for the account on the given date
